title: End User IDs
description: Condensed, normalized encapsulation of all end user identifiers. NOTE: At least one of the fields is required.

xdm:realmId.title: Realm
xdm:realmId.description: The optional realm associated with the identity stitching strategy.

xdm:mcId.title: Marketing Cloud identifier
xdm:mcId.description: A unique identifier from Adobe Marketing Cloud.
